text: Abramovka () is a rural locality (a settlement) and the administrative center of Abramovskoye Rural Settlement of Talovsky District, Voronezh Oblast, Russia. The population was 3363 as of 2010. There are 30 streets.Улицы поселка Абрамовка (Абрамовское с/п) == Geography == The settlement is located in the Don basin in the interfluve of Bitiuga and Khopra, 145 km south-east from Voronezh. == Ethnicity == The settlement is inhabited by Russians. == References == Category:Rural localities in Talovsky District
title: Abramovka, Abramovskoye Rural Settlement, Talovsky District, Voronezh Oblast
